meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> that hits at <radical>night</radical> leaves even more <kanji>fluid</kanji> than normal. It's dark at night, so the sun isn't there to help evaporate all that tsunami <kanji>liquid</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>fluid</kanji> stays in the <reading>駅</reading> (えき) longer than anywhere else. All of those tsunami liquids pour deep inside the 駅 late at night and the sun still can't reach them to help evaporate them during the day. It's a real *night*mare.
